alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 12:34PM PST until January 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of a trace to 3 inches below 6500 feet and 3 to 6 inches above 6500 feet. West winds of 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Light snow accumulations possible with heavier showers through the day and into this evening. Strong west winds all day. * IMPACTS...Ice and snow covered roads in the higher elevations could make travel difficult. Fog will also reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains
